Description: Body sherd of Attic pottery Gordion cup; interior glazed black; exterior: reserved handle zone with dilute brown band below; black lower body with band in added red and part of narrow reserved band below; inscription on exterior.
Curator's comments: The sherd belongs to the same vessel as Cambridge Fitzwilliam GR.125.1894, according to Robertson, though the red band (or stacking ring?) does not appear on the latter.
